name: body-slam
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.
short_effect: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: A full-body slam that may cause paralysis.
flavor_text.emerald: A full-body slam that may cause paralysis.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: The user drops its full body on the foe. It may leave the foe paralyzed.
